name: Something about Super Mario on Scratch Reboot ReMustached
name_original: Something about Super Mario on Scratch Reboot ReMustached
description:
v.4 Remustached!

v.3 (speed demon challenge) NEW MODE by the brilliant @Bomar123 go check him out but anyway if you click the start button you'll not see 2 options one the original option and two the brand new SPEED DEMON option where you can build up speed, as seen on the original terminal montage video! to build up speed just simply hold the down button then on the top left speed meter will build up and the higher it is the faster you are simple right? ok now go out and speedrun!

v.2 added right sfx for mario

v.1 game release

credits to duckgoose for the game

credits to terminalmontage for the mario

credits to @Bomar123 for the speed demon mode

WE NOW HAVE A SPEEDRUN PAGE

https://www.speedrun.com/something_about_super_mario_on_scratch_reboot_speedrun__the_speed_demon_challenge

talk to me on here to get your run submitted and if you want to mod there!

0.3 (+ speed demon mode): thanks to @Bomar123 for the help in the new update go check out his original project that started it all https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/586954677/

0.1: WOW, GUYS 1000 VIEWS! Thanks so much for checking out my wacky remix about a wacky speedrunning wahoo man.

something about Super Mario on Scratch Reboot

@DuckGoose9254 

=========================================

-How To Play-

Walk (Left/Right, or A/D Keys)

Jump (Up or W Keys)

Crouch (Down or S)

Wall Jump (Jump to a wall and keep holding Up or W key)

Spin Jump (Space while in air)

Long Jump (Down or S while running)

BackFlip (Up or W while crunching)

Triple Jump (Jump 3 times in a row)

Swim (Up or W while underwater)

Dive (Down or S while in air)

Avoid touching enemies, or you'll lose health. Jump on Goombas to defeat them, collect 20 coins to heal, get hearts to heal, get to the flag to move on to the next level. PRESS R AND Q IF YOU GET STUCK IN A WALL!!

To beat bowser, Jump over the fireballs. Each time he will jump backward, eventually, he can't go back any further. When he jumps, run underneath him and there's a button then jump on it.

Have Fun!
